ComicInfo.Title: Junk-Man's Treasure; The Storm Ship; Werewolf; The Ghost Girl; Day of Reckoning; When Death Takes a Hand; Omens of Death!; The Brannock Curse
ComicInfo.Summary:
Junk-Man's Treasure: A junk-man collects the heads of his victims in a trunk.
The Storm Ship: Account of a mysterious ghost ship.
Werewolf: A werewolf is on the rampage in the English countryside. A brave young constable suspects the ominous Sir Langley, but things turn out different.
The Ghost Girl: A woman in Florence is buried seemingly dead, but can free herself from the crypt and return to her lover.
Day of Reckoning: Mysterious "cat dancer" Gata (sic!) falls in love with the night club owner. And if she can't have him, no one shall.
When Death Takes a Hand: Alice has murdered her husband, but can't find where he hid the money. Conjuring his ghost she hopes to learn about the hiding place.
Omens of Death!: Weird facts.
The Brannock Curse: Irishman Brannock committed murder out of jealousy and had to flee the country. The victim's curse haunts his line for centuries. The last male descendant, Lawrence, meets his fate on a skiing slope.
